name: Hitbox TV Cruft Remover
description:
Removes all the cruft horizontally so that the video and chat will take up the entire width of the page.
Removes height limit of player in windowed mode.
additional_info:
2015-08-31:
Rewrote the entire thing to match new layout. 
Remove height limit of player
Remove padding on the sides.

2014-10-14:
Fixed fullscreen mode.

2014-10-13:
Updated for new hitbox layout.
Maximizes video better for some wide screens.
Added some comments to the CSS to make it easier for people to modify.
